======
Groups
======

Select **Task** node to get to the root of the project
:doc:`task tree </programming/task_tree>`.


.. image:: _images/groups.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Task node
	
Press the **Edit** button in the bottom of the page to change captions of the
task groups.

Use buttons in the right panel of the page to edit Client and Server modules of 
a selected group, see 
:doc:`Working with modules </programming/modules>`, 
:doc:`Code editor <code_editor>`
